txt.en: You have located the crypt on Lake Isingmere.
'Thank you for freeing me. I am no longer bound to this place, therefore I will not be a nuisance to anyone. Best of luck along your journey.'
Speak with the wailing Daegul
Open the wailing Daegul's casket deep within the crypt
Now that the captor Daegul has been defeated, the wailing Daegul will no longer be bound to the lighthouse.

'I do not wish to be here. I am bound by my captor and cannot leave until freed.

'My captor hides away inside a crypt in the middle of Lake Isingmere, south of here. Go seek him out and defeat him, so that I may finally leave this place.

'In order to call him forth, you'll need to open my casket, which is deep within the crypt.'
TBD
You have opened the casket of the wailing Daegul. The captor appears to find out who is disturbing its rest.
The captor Daegul has been defeated.
'I am free!'
TBD
Head to the island in the middle of Lake Isingmere and find the crypt located there.
Enter the crypt and look for the the wailing Daegul's casket located deep within.
TBD
The captor Daegul is not pleased that it has been disturbed.
The wailing Daegul is bound to this location and cannot leave until it is freed by defeating its captor located within an island crypt.
TBD
Locate the crypt in the middle of Lake Isingmere
The Buried Truth
Defeat the captor Daegul located deep within the crypt
